pages.title: Leopard Tortoise
pages.text: The leopard tortoise ($(o)Stigmochelys pardalis$()) is a large and attractively marked tortoise found in the savannas of eastern and southern Africa, from Sudan to the southern Cape.$(br2)It is the only extant member of the genus Stigmochelys, although in the past, it was commonly placed in Geochelone.

pages.title: Leopard Tortoise
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:apple$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
